about_the_game:
Can you imagine what kind of chemical reaction would occur if ARPG and strategic tower defense were combined, while Roguelike and idle elements were added at the same time? Crystania War 2 will give you a surprising answer!

FEATURES:
*Innovative gameplay for tower defense
*Roguelike and idle elements
*Various Heroes and exotic skill types
*Challenging Levels and BOSS fights
*Multiplex game modes
*Super fun tactical ally system

The demon legion is madly attacking the shrines around the world, trying to destroy the sacred crystals that protects the world! The forest is burning, the earth is rotting, the sea is being polluted, and mankind is perishing! Doomsday is coming! It is said that at this time, the "legendary guardian" will be born in this continent and lead the crystal warriors to save the world.

Have Fun!
Magic Cuisine Stuido
